title: Can't Spectate or Join Game
body:
Every time I try to join or spectate a game it looks like it's going to work but the client never shows up except in the task bar. Everything is updated (drivers).

Relevant info:
Windows 10
2 monitors (1080p and 4k)  - Running the game on 1080p one
1080ti Driver version: 384.76

The only real thing i tried is restart the client but doesn't work. Clueless on what to try. I was thinking of trying with only 1 monitor plugged in, but I don't want to have to keep unplugging my monitor to play the game. So if it worked, it wouldn't matter.

replies.body:
Is there any real help & support or is it seriously only this forum?

e/ nvm I see the "Submit a Ticket" now.

This can happen if your connection fails to connect, so it places the game in a dormant state.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and make sure no blocks are getting in the way.  I hope that helps!
